This exclusive offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best value while taking advantage of the early bird discount. Don't miss out on this exceptional opportunity to enhance your experience with our product. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
